Trendy Lightroom Presets

15$

About this collection:

Upgrade your visuals with our Trendy Lightroom Presets, crafted to infuse a chic and modern aesthetic into your photography effortlessly. Ideal for photographers and content creators seeking a bold and trendy vibe, these presets instantly add a touch of sophistication to your work with just a click. Stand out and make a statement with these essential presets!

What's included:

  • 8 Lightroom Mobile Presets (.DNG)
  • Installation instruction
  • Works with both iOS and Android devices
  • ALL OUR PRESETS WORK FOR EVERY SKIN TONE AND HAIR COLOR
*Presets work differently on each photo according to lighting and environment, sometimes requiring simple adjustments

Pay once and own it forever:

Make a single payment and benefit from lifetime access to your presets with unlimited use

Instant download:

After you complete the payment you will shortly receive an email with a download link. NOTE: It is advised to create online backups for the presets, we are not liable for any file loss.

Important:

Presets are intended for personal use only and cannot be transferred to others. Selling these items to third parties is prohibited and considered an offense.
